text: René Casados Morales (born October 21, 1961) is a Mexican actor. He is best known for his roles in telenovelas. His career began during the 1970s. As of February 2010, he has appeared in nineteen telenovelas (Spanish-language soap operas). He is known for his roles La madrastra as Bruno Mendizábal and Fuego en la sangre as Father Tadeo. ==Filmography== ===Television=== *Corazón guerrero (2022)...
